item.title: First Post
item.description:
wellcome! this is my blog!!! 这是我的第一篇博客文章。
你可以在这里写内容，例如：

  • 使用 Markdown 格式
  • 添加图片、代码块、列表等
  • 给文章打标签方便分类

item.title: About
item.description: I hold a master’s degree in Chemical Engineering and Technology from Chongqing University of Technology. During my graduate studies, my research on microbial diversity sparked my interest in bioinformatics. As the first student in my lab to explore multi-omics bioinformatics analysis, I had to teach myself everything from the ground up, which was both challenging and rewarding. Although my programming background was limited at first, I gradually built up my skills through persistent self-study.
